Title.evidence: We performed a randomized clinical trial

Trial_Design.evidence: Twenty-eight rotating-platform and 26 fixed-platform cemented TKAs were included.

Intervention.evidence: to compare tibial bone density changes in cemented components with different bearing designs.

Objective.evidence: to compare tibial bone density changes in cemented components with different bearing designs.

Method_Outcome.evidence: CT scans were performed postoperatively and 1 year and 2 years after the index operation.

Number_Randomised.evidence: Twenty-eight rotating-platform and 26 fixed-platform cemented TKAs were included.

Result_Outcome.evidence: Cancellous bone density loss (up to 12.6% at 2 years) was observed in all proximal tibial regions in both cohorts.
